verses.kjv: And David assembled all the princes of Israel, the princes of the tribes, and the captains of the companies that ministered to the king by course, and the captains over the thousands, and captains over the hundreds, and the stewards over all the substance and possession of the king, and of his sons, with the officers, and with the mighty men, and with all the valiant men, unto Jerusalem.
verses.web: David assembled all the princes of Israel, the princes of the tribes, the captains of the companies who served the king by division, the captains of thousands, the captains of hundreds, and the rulers over all the substance and possessions of the king and of his sons, with the officers and the mighty men, even all the mighty men of valor, to Jerusalem.
verses.ct: David gathered all of Israel's leaders to Jerusalem — the tribal chiefs, the commanders of the divisions that served the king in rotation, the officers over units of 1,000 and 100, the officials who managed the king's property and livestock and those of his sons, the court officers, the mighty warriors, and every fighting man of distinction.

verses.kjv: Then David the king stood up upon his feet, and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people: As for me, I had in mine heart to build an house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and for the footstool of our God, and had made ready for the building:
verses.web: Then David the king stood up on his feet, and said, “Hear me, my brothers, and my people! As for me, it was in my heart to build a house of rest for the ark of LORD’s covenant, and for the footstool of our God; and I had prepared for the building.
verses.ct: King David rose to his feet and addressed them: "Listen to me, my brothers and my people! I had my heart set on building a permanent home for the ark of the LORD's covenant — a resting place that would serve as the footstool of our God. I had already made preparations for the construction.

verses.kjv: But God said unto me, Thou shalt not build an house for my name, because thou hast been a man of war, and hast shed blood.
verses.web: But God said to me, ‘You shall not build a house for my name, because you are a man of war, and have shed blood.’
verses.ct: But God told me, 'You will not build a house for my name, because you are a man of war who has shed blood.'

verses.kjv: Howbeit the LORD God of Israel chose me before all the house of my father to be king over Israel for ever: for he hath chosen Judah to be the ruler; and of the house of Judah, the house of my father; and among the sons of my father he liked me to make me king over all Israel:
verses.web: However LORD, the God of Israel, chose me out of all the house of my father to be king over Israel forever. For he has chosen Judah to be prince; and in the house of Judah, the house of my father; and among the sons of my father he took pleasure in me to make me king over all Israel.
verses.ct: Yet the LORD, the God of Israel, chose me out of my entire family to be king over Israel forever. He selected the tribe of Judah to lead, and from Judah he picked my father's family. Then from among my father's sons, he was pleased to make me king over all Israel.

verses.kjv: And of all my sons, (for the LORD hath given me many sons,) he hath chosen Solomon my son to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of the LORD over Israel.
verses.web: Of all my sons (for LORD has given me many sons), he has chosen Solomon my son to sit on the throne of LORD’s kingdom over Israel.
verses.ct: And out of all my sons — the LORD has given me many — he chose Solomon to sit on the throne of the LORD's kingdom over Israel.

verses.kjv: And he said unto me, Solomon thy son, he shall build my house and my courts: for I have chosen him to be my son, and I will be his father.
verses.web: He said to me, ‘Solomon, your son, shall build my house and my courts; for I have chosen him to be my son, and I will be his father.
verses.ct: God told me, 'Your son Solomon is the one who will build my house and my courts, because I have chosen him as my son, and I will be his father.

verses.kjv: Moreover I will establish his kingdom for ever, if he be constant to do my commandments and my judgments, as at this day.
verses.web: I will establish his kingdom forever if he continues to do my commandments and my ordinances, as it is today.’
verses.ct: I will make his kingdom last forever, if he remains faithful to carry out my commands and my laws, just as he does today.'

verses.kjv: Now therefore in the sight of all Israel the congregation of the LORD, and in the audience of our God, keep and seek for all the commandments of the LORD your God: that ye may possess this good land, and leave it for an inheritance for your children after you for ever.
verses.web: Now therefore, in the sight of all Israel, LORD’s assembly, and in the audience of our God, observe and seek out all the commandments of LORD your God; that you may possess this good land, and leave it for an inheritance to your children after you forever.
verses.ct: So now, in front of all Israel — the assembly of the LORD — and with our God listening, I charge you: carefully follow every command of the LORD your God. That way you will hold on to this good land and be able to pass it down to your children as an inheritance forever.

verses.kjv: And thou, Solomon my son, know thou the God of thy father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the LORD searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts: if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.
verses.web: You, Solomon my son, know the God of your father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind; for LORD searches all hearts, and understands all the imaginations of the thoughts. If you seek him, he will be found by you; but if you forsake him, he will cast you off forever.
verses.ct: And you, Solomon my son — get to know the God of your father and serve him with a whole heart and a willing spirit. The LORD searches every heart and understands every thought and intention. If you seek him, he will let you find him. But if you abandon him, he will reject you forever.

verses.kjv: Take heed now; for the LORD hath chosen thee to build an house for the sanctuary: be strong, and do it.
verses.web: Take heed now; for LORD has chosen you to build a house for the sanctuary. Be strong, and do it.”
verses.ct: Pay attention now: the LORD has chosen you to build a house as his sanctuary. Be strong, and get it done."

verses.kjv: Then David gave to Solomon his son the pattern of the porch, and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper chambers thereof, and of the inner parlours thereof, and of the place of the mercy seat,
verses.web: Then David gave to Solomon his son the plans for the porch of the temple, for its houses, for its treasuries, for its upper rooms, for its inner rooms, for the place of the mercy seat;
verses.ct: Then David handed Solomon his son the plans for the temple porch, its buildings, its storerooms, its upper rooms, its inner chambers, and the room for the mercy seat.

verses.kjv: And the pattern of all that he had by the spirit, of the courts of the house of the LORD, and of all the chambers round about, of the treasuries of the house of God, and of the treasuries of the dedicated things:
verses.web: and the plans of all that he had by the Spirit, for the courts of LORD’s house, for all the surrounding rooms, for the treasuries of God’s house, and for the treasuries of the dedicated things;
verses.ct: He also gave him the designs for everything the Spirit had revealed to him — the courtyards of the LORD's house, all the surrounding rooms, the treasuries of God's house, and the treasuries for the dedicated gifts.

verses.kjv: Also for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of the LORD, and for all the vessels of service in the house of the LORD.
verses.web: also for the divisions of the priests and the Levites, for all the work of the service of LORD’s house, and for all the vessels of service in LORD’s house;
verses.ct: He included instructions for the divisions of the priests and Levites, for all the duties of serving in the LORD's house, and for every piece of equipment used in that service.

verses.kjv: He gave of gold by weight for things of gold, for all instruments of all manner of service; silver also for all instruments of silver by weight, for all instruments of every kind of service:
verses.web: of gold by weight for the gold, for all vessels of every kind of service; for all the vessels of silver by weight, for all vessels of every kind of service;
verses.ct: David specified the exact weight of gold for every gold item used in each type of service, and the exact weight of silver for every silver item used in each type of service.

verses.kjv: Even the weight for the candlesticks of gold, and for their lamps of gold, by weight for every candlestick, and for the lamps thereof: and for the candlesticks of silver by weight, both for the candlestick, and also for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick.
verses.web: by weight also for the lamp stands of gold, and for its lamps, of gold, by weight for every lamp stand and for its lamps; and for the lamp stands of silver, by weight for every lamp stand and for its lamps, according to the use of every lamp stand;
verses.ct: He gave the weight of gold for each gold lampstand and its lamps, and the weight of silver for each silver lampstand and its lamps, according to how each one would be used.

verses.kjv: And by weight he gave gold for the tables of shewbread, for every table; and likewise silver for the tables of silver:
verses.web: and the gold by weight for the tables of show bread, for every table; and silver for the tables of silver;
verses.ct: He specified the weight of gold for each table that held the bread of the Presence, and the weight of silver for the silver tables.

verses.kjv: Also pure gold for the fleshhooks, and the bowls, and the cups: and for the golden basons he gave gold by weight for every bason; and likewise silver by weight for every bason of silver:
verses.web: and the forks, the basins, and the cups, of pure gold; and for the golden bowls by weight for every bowl; and for the silver bowls by weight for every bowl;
verses.ct: He gave specifications for the forks, basins, and cups of pure gold, and the weight of gold for each golden bowl and the weight of silver for each silver bowl.

verses.kjv: And for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubims, that spread out their wings, and covered the ark of the covenant of the LORD.
verses.web: and for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the plans for the chariot, and the cherubim that spread out and cover the ark of LORD’s covenant.
verses.ct: He also specified the weight of refined gold for the altar of incense, and gold for the design of the chariot — the cherubim that spread their wings over the ark of the LORD's covenant.

verses.kjv: All this, said David, the LORD made me understand in writing by his hand upon me, even all the works of this pattern.
verses.web: “All this”, David said, “I have been made to understand in writing from LORD’s hand, even all the works of this pattern.”
verses.ct: David said, "The LORD made all of this clear to me — he put it in writing by his own hand — every detail of these plans."

verses.kjv: And David said to Solomon his son, Be strong and of good courage, and do it: fear not, nor be dismayed: for the LORD God, even my God, will be with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee, until thou hast finished all the work for the service of the house of the LORD.
verses.web: David said to Solomon his son, “Be strong and courageous, and do it. Don’t be afraid, nor be dismayed; for LORD God, even my God, is with you. He will not fail you, nor forsake you, until all the work for the service of LORD’s house is finished.
verses.ct: Then David told his son Solomon, "Be strong and courageous, and get this done. Don't be afraid or discouraged, because the LORD God — my God — is with you. He won't let you down or abandon you until every bit of work for the LORD's house is complete.

verses.kjv: And, behold, the courses of the priests and the Levites, even they shall be with thee for all the service of the house of God: and there shall be with thee for all manner of workmanship every willing skilful man, for any manner of service: also the princes and all the people will be wholly at thy commandment.
verses.web: Behold, there are the divisions of the priests and the Levites, for all the service of God’s house. Every willing man who has skill, for any kind of service, shall be with you in all kinds of work. Also the captains and all the people will be entirely at your command.”
verses.ct: The divisions of priests and Levites are ready to handle every aspect of service in God's house. Every skilled and willing craftsman will be available to help you with whatever needs to be done. The leaders and all the people are fully at your command."
